name: Paper-Player
description:
Player One :

  1. W = Move
  2. A = Rotate Left
  3. D = Rotate Right
  4. U = Get
  5. I = Send Emoji
  6. I (Hold) = Select Emoji

Player Two :

  1. Up = Move
  2. Left = Rotate Left
  3. Right = Rotate Right
  4. 5 = Get
  5. 6 = Send Emoji
  6. 6 (Hold) = Select Emoji

If a player's health is 0, that player defeated. If you have 0 steps left and the red arrow is pointing at the opposing player, you will automatically hit the opposing player
